full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 427 Filed 11/09/21 Page 12 of 16

Nature of Charges
9. You reported in your questionnaire that [insert question number of any YES answers for question 487, 498, or 5049]. Would that experience affect your ability to serve as a fair and impartial juror in this case?

Knowledge of the Trial Participants
10. In the your questionnaire, I listed the names of all the trial participants and you indicated that you did not know any of those the trial participants individuals by name. I'll ask you to also look around now and let me know if you recognize anyone in the courtroom.
11. I will now read a Please read this list of individuals who may be mentioned during the trial, or who may be witnesses in this case:
[Names to be supplied]
Do you know any of those people? Have you had any dealings, directly or indirectly, with any of these individuals? To your knowledge, have any of your relatives, friends, or associates had any dealings with any of these individuals?

Knowledge of Location
12. Events in this case are alleged to have taken place at the following locations:
[List to be supplied]
Are you particularly familiar with any of those locations?

Prior Jury Service
13. [For jurors who answered YES to question 187] On your questionnaire you said that you have served as a juror. In what court did you serve and was it a civil or criminal case?
4
DOJ-OGR-00006323

Nature of Charges
9. You reported in your questionnaire that [insert question number of any YES answers for question 487, 498, or 5049]. Would that experience affect your ability to serve as a fair and impartial juror in this case?

Knowledge of the Trial Participants
10. In the your questionnaire, I listed the names of all the trial participants and you indicated that you did not know any of those the trial participants individuals by name. I'll ask you to also look around now and let me know if you recognize anyone in the courtroom.
11. I will now read a Please read this list of individuals who may be mentioned during the trial, or who may be witnesses in this case:
[Names to be supplied]
Do you know any of those people? Have you had any dealings, directly or indirectly, with any of these individuals? To your knowledge, have any of your relatives, friends, or associates had any dealings with any of these individuals?

Knowledge of Location
12. Events in this case are alleged to have taken place at the following locations:

Are you particularly familiar with any of those locations?

Prior Jury Service
13. [For jurors who answered YES to question 187] On your questionnaire you said that you have served as a juror. In what court did you serve and was it a civil or criminal case?

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript or questionnaire for jurors. It contains questions about the jurors' knowledge of the case and their ability to serve impartially. The document is well-formatted and easy to read, with clear headings and numbered questions.
